content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 spheres racing in erratic flight patterns, defying physics

content.detailedDescription: I work as a security guard at a pretty big company, this facility is for shipping / receiving, and has a few large warehouses and a passive infra red motion detector security system. it was around 10:00 when the alarm went off, and the flood lights on the fence switched on. i went out to look, and didn't see anything on the ground near the area the alarm was tripped at. i then glanced around at the treeline which is about 40ft from the fence, and noticed out of the corner of my eye three dim lights above the top of the trees. they were in a triangular configuration, pointy like, but it wasn't an airplane. it was moving too slowly and not correctly for it to be an airplane. i shined my torch at it and it quickly moved out of the beam. when it passed over the high tension lines toward the back of the complex, there was a slight static like sound coming from that direction and the lines themselves sparked slightly. i ran back inside to get the other night guard and my rifle, and when i came out it was a little farther along in the direction it had been going. both me and my coworker saw it and neither of us were under the influence or anything. i shouldered my rifle and looked at the triangle through the scope, and could only see a dull metallic color, not shiny from between the three lights. after that it accelerated in the direction it was going and quickly was out of sight. i called the local sheriff to report it, and a man who said he was from the fbi came and took my statement, i said basically what i said here, and he left, and never called back.
content.summary: Motion alarm tripped, went outside and saw flying tirangular craft

content.detailedDescription:
When i was apx. 8 years old, i lived in an old farm house in upstate ny.  where i lived was fairly rural and a lot of farm land (including my family's 7 acre property).  my bedroom was on the 2nd story of the house and i remember i was tucked into bed around 8:30p which was my bedtime every night.  i recall not being able to sleep and laying in bed. the wall adjacent to my bed had 2 avg size windows with sheer curtains which faced the back yard, the pasture beyond the yard and the woodline of a forested area. parellel to the woods was a wide path mowed by a tractor that led to neighboring pastures. quite some time after being tucked into bed, i very clearly remember seeing a very bright light slowly pulsating outside my windows.  i laid there for a moment and i very faintly felt a static like thump inside my entire body every time the light pulsated, maybe once every second and i heard the sound inside me like a very faint static pulse.  i got up from my bed after a short time and looked out of my window. beyond the patch of woods and more so in the direction of the wide path i saw what i can only explain as the shape of the sun setting on the horizon with dramatic "rays" pulsating off the object. it wasn't flying, just a dome shape on the horizon with sharp sun like rays is the best i've ever been able to describe it. the light was a white-ish silver, but not like any lightbulb color i've ever seen.  it was extremely bright and a crisp color.  if i had to compare it to any color or level of brightness i've seen it would be when an eye doctor shines a light and uses a lens with the light to look deep inside one's eyes. i stood there watching the pulses (between pulses it was dark) as if a light was being switched on and off every second.  after a short time, i yelled for my mom and dad who were downstairs watching tv. after yelling and not getting a response, i ran to the stairs and yelled for them to, "come see this"! i yelled for them to hurry several times as they were walking upstairs and when we looked out of my window, nothing.  whatever it was had stopped and it did not happen again.  i remember crying out of frustration as i told my parents what i saw.  i've always carried this memory with me as it was such a strange experience that i've never been able to explain away.  there is no way it was lights from a vehicle, another house miles away, etc. it was too bright, the shape too odd and i felt and heard the pulse inside me.  
i've attached a map to show the location of my home and the vicinity i observed the lights as well as a general sketch of what i saw.
content.summary: A baffling and very vivid childhood memory

content.detailedDescription: I was working midnight shift one night and around 5:30 a.M. i drove up onto what we call "the rock dump' i backed my truck up to dump my load of rock when i observed what i thought was a new building that they must have put up without telling anyone, i noticed that it had 2 large lights, one on each end, and then i noticed it actually seemed to be something as large as a building hovering over the dump,i then pulled away and drove back down to get another load and when i came back up to the dump i noticed it was gone and then i caught something out of the corner of my eye and i looked up to see the object flying into the clouds. a minute later i caught a glimpse of it as it was heading north about 10 miles away.
content.summary: I saw a building sized object with 6-8 hatches with huge lights on each end and as it took off all i could see was a giant spotlight shining as it disappeard into the clouds

content.detailedDescription: [location removed/cms/rjl] notice objects glowing in the distance when getting off exit in aliso viejo. three bright lights appeared stationary and in triangle formation. pulsing. eventually two disappeared, but the third remained in the sky for a long time in excess of 20 minutes. i have pictures and video of event from the balcony of my house. heard lots of helicopters in area too. the last picture is taken from thru the windshield of my car and shows the difference compared to a traffic light.
content.summary: Bright lights in the distance. stationary. seemed to pulse and were in triangle formation. eventually two disappeared. third remained for 20 mins + longer

content.detailedDescription: I used to live a half mile from the papago indian reservation in south tucson. i went outside to feed the pigeons before walking to school. the pigeon cage was located on the south side of the back yard. as i finished up and closed the door i looked to the west and saw 6 slow moving objects. i studied them for a minute. i then realized they weren't conventional aircraft as they were moving at 10 to 20mph. they were flying in formation. one in front,two behind it and three behind those. they were 1/4 mile away when first i spotted them at 100' above the ground. they were shaped similar to a boomerang with a almost pointed end in the middle of them. they flew at that altitude and southerly direction for for another 15 minutes. as they came to a small mountain (1 mile x 1/2 mile x 100' high) they all stopped and began descending behind the mountain. behind the mountain was the santa cruz river which is dry most of the year. the river banks were about 30' high at that location and the river a quarter mile wide.As this all began i hollered for my mother and two of my brothers. we were all watching the whole event unfold. growing up near davis monthan airforce base i've seen plenty of aircraft. these were nothing i or my family had ever seen. i was truly excited to witness such an event. they were all about 30' from wing tip to wing tip. front to back roughly 10'. after school that day my two brothers and i went to the river to see if we could find anything. after 2hrs searching we came up empty handed. after 48 years i can still remember every detail like it was that day.
content.summary: 6 craft traveling at 20mph then stopped and defended behind really small mountain

content.detailedDescription: I was passing through the kitchen and looked out the window across the street and saw a ufo flying just above the treetops and house.  it was moving quickly in the same flight path that i have seen many other ufo's fly (in a straight line).  it was cigar shaped and very large.  the entire ufo's was covered with windows shaped in between round and octagon.   the lights were very bright.  i could not see into the ufo. i was surprised to see it.  i lost sight of the ufo when it flew past the house across the street.
content.summary: Entire ufo covered with  windows with bright lights - shaped between round & octogon

content.detailedDescription: It was around 1 am in june 1979, i was on my way home from work.Usually there was very little traffic on my way home. i was riding my motorcycle when i noticed a funny looking light in my mirrors, i slowed down and looked back, the light was big and bright and in the air not on the road. i stopped in the middle of the road, when i looked back , it was hovering above me, it looked like the sun, i had shut my motorcycle off and i could not hear any noises, i was in a area with no houses or buildings around for a few miles. it just stayed in one place for a few seconds then it just vanished, it shook me up pretty good, i started my bike and flew home, i have only told a very few people about this, still do not know what it was.
content.summary: Observed a sun like object following behind me.
